main_definition: Complications refer to the difficulties, problems, or unexpected issues that arise during a process or situation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Difficulties in medical conditions arising during treatment or recovery
meanings_and_examples.example: The surgery had complications which led to an extended hospital stay.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unforeseen problems that arise when executing a plan or strategy
meanings_and_examples.example: The project faced several complications due to unanticipated budget cuts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Additional challenges that make an already difficult situation worse
meanings_and_examples.example: Her financial troubles were compounded when she lost her job and received a medical bill.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Complications in relationships due to misunderstandings or conflicts
meanings_and_examples.example: Their marriage faced several emotional complications after the infidelity.
